document.title: Les dernières notes de Famitsu
document.author: Anh - NeoAngel
document.text:
Voici les dernières notes du magazine japonais Famitsu, vous noterez les excellentes notes de Kingdom Hearts II et Mario & Luigi RPG 2×2, mais aussi la note de Simple 2000, une des notes les plus basses du magazine depuis sa création.
Kingdom Hearts II (PS2, Square Enix): 10 / 9 / 10 / 10 – (39/40) Mario & Luigi RPG 2×2 (Partners in Time) (NDS, Nintendo): 9 / 9 / 8 / 9 – (35/40) Front Mission 5 (PS2, Square Enix): 8 / 8 / 8 / 8 – (32/40) Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza Gundam Mahjong DS: Oyaji nimo Agarareta koto nai noni! (NDS, Bandai): 7 / 8 / 7 / 7 – (29/40) Super Robot Taisen MX Portable (PSP, Banpresto): 8 / 8 / 7 / 6 – (29/40) Harobots Action! (NDS, Sunrise): 7 / 7 / 5 / 5 – (24/40) Otome Hao Anesama ni Koi Shiteru (PS2, Alchemist): 5 / 7 / 6 / 6 – (24/40) White Clarity: And, the Tears Became You (PS2, Princess Soft): 5 / 6 / 5 / 6 – (22/40) Simple 2000 Series Vol. 94: The Aka-Champion – Come On Baby (PS2, D3): 3 / 5 / 3 / 4 – (15/40)
